.. _mscexamine:

mscexamine: Examine mosaic exposures displayed as single frames
===============================================================

**Package: mscred**

.. raw:: html

  <section id="s_synopsis">
  <h3>Synopsis</h3>
  <p>
  A multiextension Mosaic image is displayed, if needed, and then the image
  cursor is used to select operations and a data regions.
  The operations are performed on the full Mosaic image.
  Operations include data examination and PSF fitting.
  </p>
  </section>
  <section id="s_usage_">
  <h3>Usage	</h3>
  <p>
  mscexamine input frame
  </p>
  </section>
